defaultSeo.title: Karim Hamdy | Front-end developer
defaultSeo.description: Karim Hamdy is a front-end developer, experienced in creating beautiful and functional websites and web applications.

heroData.paragraph: Passionate about coding, and making my client ideas come true.

aboutItems: I'm a front-end developer based in Alexandria, Egypt.
I like to design and build beautiful and functional websites and web applications, taking special care to produce clear and understandable code.
I love teamwork and good communication, always open to feedback and willing to learn new things.
In my free time I like to hangout with my friends or play videogames.
aboutData.resumeParagraph: You can check my resumé in the link below.

projects.name: React Custom Chart
projects.summary: A simple custom chart for React.
